alert.note: Alert for Eastern Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 14 at 6:23PM EST until December 17 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy, wet snow possible. Snow accumulations will vary with elevation. Accumulations of 4 to 10 inches are possible, with the best chance for 6 inches or more over higher elevations. * WHERE...Eastern Windham County. * WHEN...From Thursday evening through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel may become very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will be heavy, wet and slushy.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
